title: ZuppaÂ Toscana
directions: In a large soup pot crumble the ground pork over medium heat
Add seasonings, onion, and garlic and cook until meat is browned and onions are soft
Set aside 1/4 cup chicken broth the pour in the remaining broth and turn the heat to high, bring to a boil
Once boiling add in potatoes and cook until fork tender, about 15 minutes
Stir together 1/4 cup chicken broth and corn starch, pour into to soup and allow to thicken
Turn heat off and stir in kale
Stir in about 2 tablespoons of fat free half & half in each bowl when serving
Add a pinch or two of red pepper flake to each bowl, if desired
ingredients: 8 medium Yukon gold potatoes, cut into 1 inch cubes
